head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TUROF, RUTH RABINOW

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TUROF, RUTH RABINOW

block.p: TUROF-Ruth Rabinow. Of East Meadow, New York, died on Thursday, May 18, 2000. Wife of the late Sam; survived by daughters Merrly (Ray) Amodio of Parkland FL, Jackie (William) Bennett of NH, and their father, Frank Rabinow of FL. Beloved grandmother of Merissa, Lauren, Brian, William Jr. and Jonathan. Graveside services Sunday, May 21, 2000 at 3PM, Star of David, 7701 Bailey Rd, North Lauderdale, FL. Contributions in Ruth's name may be made to Gilda's Club or the American Cancer Society.
